lead_paragraph: The legislation, which opponents contend protects stolen works while they’re being exhibited in the United States, will head to the full Senate for a vote.

headline.print_headline: Bill to Shield International Art Loans Gains in Senate
headline.main: Bill to Shield International Art Loans Gains in Senate
